name: Jerry's endless travels Escape (Acorn Atom mono prototype)
name_original: Jerry's endless travels Escape (Acorn Atom mono prototype)
description:
My first conversion for Acorn Atom computers and this is currently prototype. Just like in original game you need to find treasure and escape from planet. Secondary quest is to find 2 hidden treasures. Also some content was cut to have enough memory.

Controls:Q-Up,A-Down,O-Left,P-Right,Space and B -Shots left-right.

And one more thing. All versions for original game on youtube is very old and current versions have better music and gameplay.
